sentence.Network_en: "Tired and emotional" is a code word for being drunk.
sentence.Network_cn: “又累又激动”是形容人喝醉酒的一种委婉说法。

sentence.Network_en: Some people moved in silky, liquid movements, others were jerky, probably drunk.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些人动作平稳流畅，其他人则跌跌撞撞，大概是喝醉了。

sentence.Network_en: The landlord refused to serve him because he considered him too drunk.
sentence.Network_cn: 酒吧老板觉得他已经喝多了，拒绝再给他添酒。

jx.jx_en_mean: creating a public disturbance under the influence of alcohol

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: past participle of drink; compare with drunken

entry.def: Someone who is drunk has drunk so much alcohol that they cannot speak clearly or behave sensibly.

example.ex: Stewart could not remember exactly why he had done it because he was so drunk...
example.tran: 斯图尔特记不清他为什么要那样做了,因为他烂醉如泥。

example.ex: I got drunk and had to be carried home...
example.tran: 我喝醉了，只好让人把我送回家。

entry.def: A drunk is someone who is drunk or frequently gets drunk.

example.ex: A drunk lay in the alley.
example.tran: 一个酒鬼躺在小胡同里。

entry.def: If you are drunk with a strong emotion or an experience, you are in a state of great excitement because of it.

example.ex: They are currently drunk with success...
example.tran: 他们现在正陶醉于成功之中。

example.ex: I felt drunk with the excitement of life.
example.tran: 当时我沉醉于生活中的精彩刺激。

entry.def: Drunk is the past participle of drink.

means.word_mean: 1. stupefied or excited by a chemical substance (especially alcohol);
2. as if under the influence of alcohol;

example.en: The cowboy, really country drunk this time, got to town somehow and started a fight.
example.zh: 那牛仔这次真的喝醉了，不知怎的到了城里，还挑起一场斗殴。

list.explanation: 头脑昏瓦的，迷糊的，头晕目眩的(尤指因工作过度或压力过重所致)

example.en: He was punch-drunk after the annual meeting.
example.zh: 开完年会，他已累得头昏眼花了。

example.en: I feel punchy when I drink too much coffee.
example.zh: 我咖啡一喝多，就觉得脑子晕晕乎乎的。

auth_sentence.content: Ira was arrested for being drunk and disorderly repeatedly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ira was arrested for being drunk and disorderly repeatedly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ira was arrested for being drunk and disorderly repeatedly.

auth_sentence.content: Gallon Drunk's James Johnston is a busy boy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gallon Drunk's James Johnston is a busy boy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gallon Drunk's James Johnston is a busy boy.

auth_sentence.content: Just as you wouldn't do well equally drunk.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just as you wouldn't do well equally drunk.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just as you wouldn't do well equally drunk.

Sentence.sentence: They do not give up drunk driving.

They range from minor cases of deliberate damaging of things to much more serious offenses, such as car accidents involving drunk drivers or bank robberies but Florence has to report all of these violations from the thief who took typewriters from every unlock room in the dormitory to the thief who stole one million dollars worth of art work from the university museum.

sentences.en: There were a lot of drunk drivers on the roads on Saturday nights.
sentences.cn: 星期六的晚上马路上有很多酒后驾车者。

jushi.english: There were a lot of drunk drivers on the roads on Saturday nights.
jushi.chinese: 星期六的晚上马路上有很多酒后驾车者。

jushi.english: The police charged him with being drunk and disorderly.
jushi.chinese: 警方指控他酒醉并且扰乱治安。
